# unload(_:)

**Instance Method**

Unloads the specified extension context.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func unload(_ extensionContext: WKWebExtensionContext) throws
```

## Discussion

Causes the context to stop running.

## Related Documentation

- **unload(_:)**: Unloads the specified extension context.
